title: Encore: The Fire On The Other Side Of The World
dc:creator: WBUR
description: We wrap up the summer with another listener favorite: a Cherokee tale in which Yeardley Smith (The Simpsons, Oil and Water) plays a feisty, creative spider who proves that power and strength aren't always about physical size.
itunes:author: WBUR
